Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates by stating that Kamala Harris was "clearly intoxicated" and "throwing up in the bushes & staggering aimlessly" at the Cleveland airport.
Contradict fact: The claim contradicts the fact that Kamala Harris was not intoxicated, nor was she staggering or vomiting, as seen in the video from the Turkey Trot event in Des Moines.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support or evidence to prove that Kamala Harris was intoxicated or exhibiting such behavior at the Cleveland airport.
Problematic assumption: The claim makes a problematic assumption that the image in question shows Kamala Harris in Cleveland on October 24th, when it actually shows her in Des Moines on Thanksgiving.
Understate: There is no evidence of understatement bias in this claim.
Falters at times: The claim falters by misrepresenting the location and context of the image, leading to a false narrative.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not provide an alternative explanation for the image or suggest any other possible interpretations.
